txt.en: Talk to Dáin
As the cheers fall quiet, Thráin begins the ordering of the Haban’akkâ
Such a rousing speech is worthy of a cheer!
Instance: Council of the Seven
'I think we're in luck, Hermáth.\n\n'It doesn't sound like it's started yet, but we'd better hurry over!'
Thrain is addressing the Kings of the Seven Houses at Amdân.
Thráin can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou should cheer for Thráin.
After coming to Azanulbizar at long last, King Thráin has called the Kings of the Seven Houses to council at Amdân.

'I hope my father did not think me imprudent in my concern, Hermáth.

'I could tell he, too, was displeased that the Iron-folk would be held in reserve, but a dwarf of his station would not dare say as much. At the very least, I seem to have amused our elders and some of the Kings!

'I fear we have a long day ahead of us on the morrow, my friend. Let us sleep while we might!'
Dáin can be found at Amdân.\n\nAfter listening to Thráin's council with the Kings of the Seven Houses, Dáin has beckoned you. You should talk to Dáin.
As Thráin and the others prepare to rest, Dáin beckons you over
'Rest well, Hermáth. I shall see you in the morn!'
Thrain is addressing the Kings of the Seven Houses at Amdân.
Dáin can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou should accompany Dáin and join the gathering at Amdân.
As you take your place beside Dáin, Thráin begins to speak
Listen to Dáin
<rgb=#FF00FF>Cheer</rgb> for Thráin
Listen as Thrain addresses the Kings of the Seven Houses at Amdân
Talk to Dáin
Follow Dáin and join the gathering at Amdân
Listen as Thrain addresses the Kings of the Seven Houses at Amdân
As Thráin and the others prepare to take rest, Dáin beckons you over
Dáin can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou should talk to Dáin.
